cbir.retriever

Class RetrieverScoreBased

  • java.lang.Object
    • cbir.retriever.RetrieverScoreBased
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Retriever

    public class RetrieverScoreBased
extends java.lang.Object
implements Retriever
    A Retriever that uses a score function for the ranking instead of a distance function. NOTE: The score based retriever is not compatible with indexing, since our index structure did not improve the results.
    Author:
    Chris Wendler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<ImageContainer> database
      The image database defined by a list of images.
      private Score score
      The score function that is used to compare the images in the database.

        Parameters:
        image - the query image.
        type - the descriptor type of interest.
        amount - the desired amount of nearest neighbors.
        Returns:
        The list of the nearest neighbors.
